summary: A small-time reporter tries to convince the police she saw a murder in the apartment across from hers.
cast: Margot Kidder|Jennifer Salt|Charles Durning|William Finley|Lisle Wilson|Barnard Hughes|Mary Davenport|Dolph Sweet|Bobby C. Collins|Cathy Berry|Olympia Dukakis|Art Evans|Catherine Gaffigan|Justine Johnston|James Mapes|Laun Maurer|Bob Melvin|Burt Richards|Sealo
title: Hermanas
